title: JPMorgan Chase & Co. - Academic Intern
description: As an Academic intern, I have contributed to the modernization of AML/KYC data systems by working with technologies like Apache Avro and AWS (Elasticache, Cassandra, S3) to optimize data processing and storage. I'm involved in designing and implementing data pipelines, utilizing Avro for schema management and serialization. I've also worked with AWS infrastructure, including Elasticache for caching and Cassandra for scalable distributed data storage, which has helped to improve the performance and reliability of AML/KYC data workflows.

title: JPMorgan Chase & Co. - Summer Intern
description: I worked in Controls under the AML/KYC team. I developed backend services using Spring Boot, Redis, and Elasticache, enhancing performance and reducing response times. I implemented a Random Forest Classifier to streamline AML derivations and collaborated in a hackathon to integrate innovative KYC functionality using Synthetic Data Vault. My intern project placed 2nd in end-of-summer presentations, and I ranked in the top 20% of North American and European Chase interns in the Secure Code Competition. Additionally, I participated in Agile sprints, led discussions, and facilitated decisions to keep deliverables on track.

title: The Sparks Foundation - Graduate Rotational Intern
description: As a remote intern, I participated in the Graduate Rotational Intern Program with a focus on Computer Vision & IoT in June 2023 and Data Science & Business Analytics in July 2023. I also developed image processing algorithms for computer vision applications, facial and emotional recognition, and automated optical inspection. Used Raspberry Pi, Nvidia Jetson, and a microcontroller in IoT projects.

title: Ware RG - Undergraduate Research Assistant
description: Worked as an Undergraduate Research Assistant. We measured the impact of youth engagement in different types of informal education programming on leadership, academic, and STEM development. Co-wrote proposals, developed lesson plans, scheduled meetings, and assisted in managing team resources.
